article.title: Status and history for tzc
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Fixed the iso639-3 and xml:lang attributes in the .xml. Thanks to Sascha Brawer for reporting this error.
ISO 639-3 tzc has been retired and merged with tzo, “Tzotzil”.

The titles of the article already spell out the article number, so the number have been removed. Moved the item tags from the text of the items to the tag attribute. Removed the item tags for article 2, which is not a list but two paragraphs.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
